link_desc:
Description

This is AlaxalA AX2400S series Switch monitoring Zabbix template using SNMP. This template based on mib2zabbix.

This template is checked on following environment:

  • Zabbix Server 5.2 on Ubuntu Server 20.04 LTS
  • AX2430S-48T, AX2430S-48T2X
  • SNMPv1
    • not checked SNMPv2/v3.

Usage

Before using this template, set snmp config on AlaxalA Switch (probability default is off).

Import this template and link this template to AlaxalA switch host config. If create AlaxalA host using this template,

  • interface is set SNMP
  • If many snmp error is occurred, using bulk request set DISABLED (this is recommended).
    • Sometimes, this option using bulk request causes many SNMP errors(ex: general error/network error/etc...) and drop SNMP request.

For more information and updated, view github page.

https://github.com/hinananoha/alaxala-ax24s-zabbix-template
author: hinananoha
